attributes.description:
Without a doubt, the RS7 holds the title as being the best performance sportback on the road. Proudly introducing our 2019 Audi RS7 Sportback Quattro like new with only 28 000 kmâ€™s to its name. Specifications on this Audi include Heads Up Display, Carbon Fibre Interior trim, Electric Front Seats, Satellite Navigation System, Leather Interior, Electric, Audi Drive Select, Paddle Shift, Leather Steering Wheel, Reverse Camera, LED Head Lights, Rain Sensor and more! Our dealership is here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery. We are affiliated with all major financial institutions for your convenience and our dedicated team demonstrates great knowledge and experience in the motor industry. Viewing is essential on this very rare and sought after example so call now for more information.

Trade-ins accepted.
Delivery Country wide.
Finance available with all major banks.
13 Payne Street, Pinetown, KZN.
